resources.string: The Database resource group provides access to the databases managed by PMP
Indicate the right to read an existed database
Indicate the right to modify the data of a database, including inserting, updating and deleting data in tables but not deletion from tables
Indicate the right to create and delete new tables
This action isn\'t allowed by the user. If your Service Level indicates otherwise, it could be that the user has changed the Service Level of your Application.
